articles.description: With 16 lawsuits now having been filed against Deshaun Watson, his attorney said "any allegation" that the Houston Texans quarterback "forced a woman to commit a sexual act is completely false."
articles.content: HOUSTON -- With the number of lawsuits against Deshaun Watson reaching 16 on Tuesday, the quarterback's lawyer, Rusty Hardin, said in a statement that his law firm has "strong evidence" showing that … [+4262 chars]

articles.title: Incredible extent of SVGs injuries finally revealed - Supercars.com
articles.content:
Shane van Gisbergen has revealed he won all three races of the Penrite Oil Sandown SuperSprint with not only with a broken collarbone, but with three broken ribs.
Sharing a photo of an X-ray taken w… [+1636 chars]

articles.title: 'Like you’re on trial for murder': Patrick Dangerfield banned for three games by AFL tribunal - The Guardian
articles.description: The Geelong star will miss the clash with Brisbane for his hit that left Adelaide’s Jake Kelly with a concussion and a broken nose
articles.content:
Geelong star Patrick Dangerfield has explained he felt like he was on trial for murder in the lead-up to his AFL tribunal hearing for a bump gone wrong on Adelaides Jake Kelly.

articles.title: 'What a weirdo': Jarryd Hayne's recorded phone calls released - 9News
articles.description: In recorded phone calls released following yesterday's guilty verdict, Hayne is heard telling a friend 'that sheila went to the NRL'.
